answers.answer: i heard awhile ago on here if you start feeling sick again that far along it could be a sign of labor... i have a friend who has been sick like that the past week nd last night she finally went into labor nd had her son today....
Ugh I hope that is the case with me!!
I've not felt like eating much the past couple days and have definitely been bothered by smells more even "good" ones. I'm 36 wks.
Get checked out. I had those symptoms and it was preeclampsia

question: Everything I eat today is making me want to throw up, even scents are making me nauseous! I also have a little headache not too bad though just makes me feel a little dizzy, is all of this normal at 38+5?
title: is this normal?
